Header.title: Hi, I'm Florencia
Header.subtitle: Frontend Developer based in Buenos Aires, AR.

About.title: About
About.text: My name is Florencia Soto, I'm a Trainee Frontend Developer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I'm currently looking for my first job experience where I can apply what I learned, face new challenges and give my best to grow as a developer and person. If you want to work with me or know me better, please send me an email, or a message on LinkedIn. Thanks for visiting!
